name: peppermint
text: It speaks to Ray's character that so many of his sins were him attempting to do a good deed but failing due to a complete lack of basic empathy.

text: It also says that Ray is the shit.

name: fineoakstructure
text: If it makes you feel any better, I did check out the link later that day when I got home.  I can honestly say this: I had never seen that before.  I'll always like the guy, but damn if that didn't upset me...and this is a guy who would still defend Back to School.

name: blarghamagarky
text: it is one of the best things I have seen on youtube

name: cypher
text:
I am sorely tempted to agree with you. So I will.
Chubby for amusing linkage, go!

text: Saw it a few months ago, it changed my life.  Sorry for not commenting on it sooner.

text: "This video has been removed due to terms of use violation." meh.

text: I guess this is what I get for waiting a year to finally follow up on it.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
It was just a corny Rodney Dangerfield music video from the 80's, if I remember it right. It really wasn't anything special. I think it's ok to say this now, blarghamagarky is probably gone. '

Unless she has a "saint"-like resurrection.

name: rowboat
text: "Saint-like" except that someone would probably care. Because she's hot. And saint isn't.

name: housewife
text: it's been removed from youtube. What was the video? I could probably find it by typing in a keyword

name: riazm
text:
Also: Ray is only in hell because he sold his soul. He's not necessarily a bad guy.

Beef on the other hand just went to Hell..I'm not sure why, maybe puking on an electrical socket counts as suicide.

name: featurelessvoid
text: I think it just counts as vandalism.

name: waldo913
text: Wait wait wait.... you can go to hell for vandalism?!   HELL?!

name: clockworkorange
text: You can go to hell for eating the wrong animals or turning doorknobs on the wrong days. You have to be careful with all that sin stuff. Which I say "fuck it".

name: belgand
text: Dude you can go to hell for wearing clothing made of mixed fibers. Poly-cotton blend is hella sinful.

name: tbtabby
text: I wish I'd noticed this before commenting.

name: tekende
text: Well, at least your intentions were good.

name: i_love_kate
text: Interesting that in the Achewood vision of hell, bad actions committed with good intentions are counted as sins. Unless the shame felt by Ray because of his misdemeanor is simply the punishment for one of his other sins?

name: plusminus
text: I never noticed before, how just that one panel is in colour. Nice touch...

name: tbtabby
text: Karl Marx was right.

name: deovalente
text: This is probably stupid of me to notice this NOW, but all the scenes with Ray in the hall are in color, and everything else is monochrome.

name: budenhagen
text:
"You slapped a twenty on my table and I ate it, Ray, in my innocence."

Every time I read this strip, I read slowly, praying my guts out that the last line was somehow changed.

name: vulpes-aurum
text: Have you noticed that "Ray's car" sounds like "racecar"? COINCIDENCE?
